author: Barry Popik
title: “How to dress for cold weather: 1. take your pants off 2. get back into bed”
text:
“How to dress for cold weather: 1. take your pants off 2. get back into bed” is a jocular winter saying that has been
printed on many images.
X/Twitter

@JamesABacon

1. Take your pants off
2. Get back into bed
